org.jhove2.module.assess
Class RuleSet

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.module.assess.RuleSet

@Persistent
public class RuleSet
extends Object

A container for a set of rules that are associated with a particular type of object .

Field Summary
protected  String alternative
          The text value to be assigned to the AssessmentResultSet.narrativeResult if the RuleSet evaluates to false.
protected  String consequent
          The text value to be assigned to the AssessmentResultSet.narrativeResult if the RuleSet evaluates to true.
protected  String description
          A short textual description of the RuleSet's purpose
protected  boolean enabled
          Whether or not to evaluate the rules in this ruleSet
protected  String name
          The name of the RuleSet.
protected  String objectFilter
          The className (type) of objects that this RuleSet is designed to assess
protected  List<Rule> rules
          The list of Rule(s) comprising the RuleSet
 
Constructor Summary
RuleSet()
          Instantiates a new RuleSet

          Gets the ruleSet description

          Gets the ruleSet name
